articles.title: Top Gainers and Losers today on 15 May, 2024: Coal India, Cipla, Asian Paints, Tata Motors among most active stocks; Check full list here | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Top Gainers and Losers Today : The Sensex lost 117.58 points, or -0.16, to settle at 73104.61, while the Nifty lost 17.3 points, or -0.08, to close at 22217.85.
articles.content: Top Gainers and Losers Today : The Nifty closed at 22217.85, down by 0.08% today. Throughout the day, the Nifty reached a high of 22297.55 and a low of 22151.75. On the other hand, the Sensex traded … [+3391 chars]
